alert.note: Alert for Chester; Crockett; Fayette; Gibson; Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 5:13PM CDT until April 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Crockett County in western Tennessee... South central Gibson County in western Tennessee... Northeastern Fayette County in western Tennessee... Northwestern Hardeman County in western Tennessee... Haywood County in western Tennessee... Madison County in western Tennessee... West central Chester County in western Tennessee... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 511 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dancyville, or 8 miles southwest of Brownsville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Humboldt, Henderson, Fairview, Bells, Three Way, Hillville, Bemis, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Adair, Dancyville, Cloverport, Mercer, Carroll, Medina, Gadsden, Stanton and Medon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chester; Crockett; Fayette; Gibson; Hardeman; Haywood; Madison
